I am absolutely satisfied with the Astylish Women's V Neck Roll-Up Sleeve Button-Down Blouse! This top is both stylish and versatile, making it a perfect addition to my wardrobe. The V-neck design is flattering, and the roll-up sleeves add a casual yet chic touch. The material is lightweight and breathable, making it comfortable to wear all day long, whether for work, casual outings, or even a night out. I also love how easily it pairs with jeans, slacks, or skirts, giving me endless styling options. The button-down detail adds a polished look without feeling overly formal.  Overall, this blouse exceeded my expectations in both quality and style. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a versatile and comfortable top!

This lightweight, button down shirt is just perfect for worn open over a tank or bikini top for a walk on the beach, thrown over some ripped jeans for a casual night out, or tucked into work pants for a day at the office. It’s airy, just like it looks, without hanging shabbily. It falls perfectly. I need all the colors!! As a VERY happily married closer-to-fifty-than-forty mom  of 7, I’m not sure it was this shirt or my carefree, silly attitude that got me hit on when I wore it out with a pair of cute earrings and ripped jeans, but either way I absolutely love it. 😜

The sleeves are very long, the color is more yellow than the light khaki which I ordered.  The fabric is very nice and soft.  I hand washed and hung to dry and it held its shape and does not need to be ironed.  Just for clarification, I did go by the measurements in the chart, that is the reason I went up to a large. Instead it was to tight. So my opinion is it runs small. I'm returning it Instead swapping it out because I really want an oversized look.

I took a chance on this shirt based on other reviews. Despite the fact that it's not actually linen, it is lightweight and soft, and looks like linen but without as much wrinkling. I'm tall (5' 10"-ish), so I sized up one size. It's still a little on the shorter side in both the sleeves and overall length, but I intended to roll the sleeves up and wear it open in the front over a tank top as kind of a casual "jacket" for an overly-cold office. For that purpose, it fits fine. It's still loose in the shoulders and bust.  My biggest complaint is the color. I was wanting a terra cotta type color, as is pictured in the item photo. It actually turned out to be a fairly vivid red with slightly orangish undertones. Since I regularly color my hair in various shades of red/plum/burgundy, the shirt color only sometimes works for me.  Still, I really like the feel of the fabric and it seems well-made, so I've come back to order it in a more neutral color. So, if the exact shade matters to you, I would avoid this item or go for a neutral color. If you're just looking for a nice summer-to-fall weight top, this is a good one.
Loved it so much, I ordered a black and white one!

It is the linen look but it is a salmon color so it was too dull a color for my skin. These blouses are terrific value.
